list-view-config.query-select:
PREFIX rdfs: <http://www.w3.org/2000/01/rdf-schema#> PREFIX core: <http://vivoweb.org/ontology/core#> PREFIX afn: <http://jena.hpl.hp.com/ARQ/function#> PREFIX vitro: <http://vitro.mannlib.cornell.edu/ns/vitro/0.7#> PREFIX foaf: <http://xmlns.com/foaf/0.1/>
SELECT DISTINCT ?award ?awardTitle ?person ?personName WHERE { ?subject ?property ?position OPTIONAL { ?position core:relates ?person . ?position a core:Position . ?person a foaf:Person . ?person rdfs:label ?personName } OPTIONAL { ?person core:relatedBy ?awardrecepit . ?awardreceipt a core:AwardReceipt . ?awardreceipt core:relates ?award . ?award a core:Award . ?award rdfs:label ?awardTitle . } } ORDER BY ?personName
list-view-config.query-construct: PREFIX core: <http://vivoweb.org/ontology/core#> CONSTRUCT { ?subject ?property ?position . ?position a core:Position . ?position core:relates ?person . ?person a foaf:Person . ?person core:relatedBy ?awardreceipt . ?awardreceipt a core:AwardReceipt . ?awardreceipt core:relates ?award . ?award a core:Award . ?award rdfs:label ?awardTitle . } WHERE { ?subject ?property ?position . ?position a core:Position . }

PREFIX core: <http://vivoweb.org/ontology/core#> CONSTRUCT { ?subject ?property ?position . ?position a core:Position . ?position core:dateTimeInterval ?dateTimeInterval . ?dateTimeInterval core:end ?dateTimeEndValue . ?dateTimeEndValue core:dateTime ?dateTimeEnd } WHERE { ?subject ?property ?position . ?position a core:Position . ?position core:relates ?person . ?person a foaf:Person . ?person core:relatedBy ?awardreceipt . ?person core:relatedBy ?awardrecepit . ?awardreceipt a core:AwardReceipt . ?awardreceipt core:relates ?award . ?award a core:Award . ?award rdfs:label ?awardTitle . }
